medical_history.chief_complaint: Second episode of right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain and epigastric bloating.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began yesterday at 11AM while eating vegetable soup, characterized by substantial colicky pain in the RUQ. This episode follows a previous similar episode with more prominent epigastric fullness. There were no accompanying symptoms such as fevers, chills, nausea, or vomiting.
